short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension will allow you to monitor product price and stock right from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension allows you to monitor the Flipkart product price and stock right from the browser alerts you when there is a price and stock changes.
